column1: Does this statement concern anyone? “Sioux Falls, the state’s largest city, made national news recently due to a coronavirus outbreak at Smithfield Foods. Smithfield is a Chinese-owned global food empire. It is also America’s largest meat producer.”

Trump can not be trusted to handle a pandemic.
